content.text:
# Draft:Battle of Dilam (1840)

The Battle of Dilam is a battle that took place during the year 1840. During the battle a Saudi force under the command of Faisal bin Turki Al Saud fought against the Egypt Eyalet which was under the command of Ibrahim Pasha during the rule of Muhammad Ali Pasha. The battle resulted in a a Saudi victory with the defeat of the
